item.title: [c21] Fiery Encore
item.description:
Sorcery

Discard a card, then draw a card. When you discard a nonland card this way, Fiery Encore deals damage equal to that card's mana value to target creature or planeswalker.

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.title: [c21] Cursed Mirror
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {R}.

As Cursed Mirror enters the battlefield, you may have it become a copy of any creature on the battlefield until end of turn, except it has haste.

item.title: [c21] Ruin Grinder
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Menace

When Ruin Grinder dies, each player may discard their hand and draw seven cards.

Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card. Reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

item.title: [c21] Rousing Refrain
item.description:
Sorcery

Add {R} for each card in target opponent's hand. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. Exile Rousing Refrain with three time counters on it.

Suspend 3—{1}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [c21] Rionya, Fire Dancer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create X tokens that are copies of another target creature you control, where X is one plus the number of instant and sorcery spells you've cast this turn. They gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [c21] Radiant Performer
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Flash

When Radiant Performer enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, choose target spell or ability that targets only a single permanent or player. Copy that spell or ability for each other permanent or player the spell or ability could target. Each copy targets a different one of those permanents and players.

item.title: [c21] Laelia, the Blade Reforged
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Warrior

Haste

Whenever Laelia, the Blade Reforged attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

Whenever you exile one or more cards from your library and/or your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Laelia.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ipS8qV-qiCU

item.title: [c21] Surge to Victory
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's mana value. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [c21] Blight Mound
item.description:
Enchantment

Attacking Pests you control get +1/+0 and have menace.

Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

item.title: [c21] Author of Shadows
item.description:
Creature — Shade Warlock

When Author of Shadows enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all opponents' graveyards. Choose a nonland card exiled this way. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

item.title: [c21] Fain, the Broker
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warlock

{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

{T}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: Create a Treasure token.

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.

{3}{B}: Untap Fain, the Broker.

item.title: [c21] Essence Pulse
item.description:
Sorcery

You gain 2 life. Each creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

item.title: [c21] Cunning Rhetoric
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an opponent attacks you and/or one or more planeswalkers you control, exile the top card of that player's library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

item.title: [c21] Bold Plagiarist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Rogue

Flash

Whenever an opponent puts one or more counters on a creature they control, they put the same number and kind of counters on Bold Plagiarist.

item.title: [c21] Keen Duelist
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

At the beginning of your upkeep, you and target opponent each reveal the top card of your library. You each lose life equal to the mana value of the card revealed by the other player. You each put the card you revealed into your hand.

item.title: [c21] Incarnation Technique
item.description:
Sorcery

Demonstrate (When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it.)

Mill five cards, then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [c21] Veinwitch Coven
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Warlock

Menace

Whenever you gain life, you pay {B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [c21] Tivash, Gloom Summoner
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warlock

Lifelink

At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, you may pay X life, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn. If you do, create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying.

item.title: [c21] Stinging Study
item.description:
Instant

You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone.

item.title: [c21] Marshland Bloodcaster
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Warlock

Flying

{1}{B}, {T}: Rather than pay the mana cost of the next spell you cast this turn, you may pay life equal to that spell's mana value.

item.title: [c21] Bojuka Bog
item.description:
Land

Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped.

When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

{T}: Add {B}.

item.title: [c21] Battlefield Forge
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {R} or {W}. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

item.description:
Land

Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B}.

item.description:

{T}: Add {C}.

item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {W} or {B}. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [c21] Boros Garrison
item.description:
Land

Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped.

When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {R}{W}.

item.title: [c21] Tainted Field
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {W} or {B}. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

item.title: [c21] Orzhov Basilica
item.description:
Land

Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped.

When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {W}{B}.

item.title: [c21] Temple of Silence
item.description:
Land

Temple of Silence enters the battlefield tapped.

When Temple of Silence enters the battlefield, scry 1.

{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

item.title: [c21] Bloodthirsty Blade
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

{1}: Attach Bloodthirsty Blade to target creature an opponent controls. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.title: [c21] Mycosynth Wellspring
item.description:
Artifact

When Mycosynth Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Coveted Jewel
item.description:
Artifact

When Coveted Jewel enters the battlefield, draw three cards.

{T}: Add three mana of any one color.

Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls attack you and aren't blocked, that player draws three cards and gains control of Coveted Jewel. Untap it.

item.title: [c21] Orzhov Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {W}{B}.

item.title: [c21] Victory Chimes
item.description:
Artifact

Untap Victory Chimes during each other player's untap step.

{T}: A player of your choice adds {C}.

item.title: [c21] Spectral Searchlight
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color they choose.

item.title: [c21] Pendant of Prosperity
item.description:
Artifact

Pendant of Prosperity enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice.

{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. Pendant of Prosperity's owner draws a card, then that player may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [c21] Deathbringer Liege
item.description:
Creature — Horror

Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.

Other black creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever you cast a white spell, you may tap target creature.

Whenever you cast a black spell, you may destroy target creature if it's tapped.

item.title: [c21] Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Advisor

Vigilance, protection from creatures

Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, destroy that creature. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [c21] Magister of Worth
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Will of the council — When Magister of Worth enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for grace or condemnation. If grace gets more votes, each player returns each creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield. If condemnation gets more votes or the vote is tied, destroy all creatures other than Magister of Worth.

item.title: [c21] Debtors' Knell
item.description:
Enchantment

({W/B} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [c21] Utter End
item.description:
Instant

Exile target nonland permanent.

item.title: [c21] Necropolis Regent
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Flying

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [c21] Infernal Offering
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose an opponent. You and that player each sacrifice a creature. Each player who sacrificed a creature this way draws two cards.

Choose an opponent. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then that player returns a creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [c21] Deathbringer Regent
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.

item.title: [c21] Curse of Disturbance
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

item.title: [c21] Parasitic Impetus
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

Whenever enchanted creature attacks, its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [c21] Boreas Charger
item.description:
Creature — Pegasus

Flying

When Boreas Charger leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent who controls more lands than you. Search your library for a number of Plains cards equal to the difference and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Angel of Serenity
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.

When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

item.title: [c21] Duelist's Heritage
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may have target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Citadel Siege
item.description:
Enchantment

As Citadel Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.

• Khans — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

• Dragons — At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.
